items.title: Lekas Expressway Will Be Closed Temporarily This Weekend
items.summary:
The Kajang–Seremban Expressway (LEKAS) will be temporarily closed due to the RHB LEKAS Highway Ride 2025 cycling event happening the weekend of 11 and 12 October. As per the highway concessionaire, the closure is intended to ensure a safe route for participants throughout the night cycling event. The closure will begin at 5PM on Saturday […]

items.title: Google’s Pixel 9a now at $349 Prime Day all-time low ($150 off), Pixel 9 Pro/XL models up to $350 off
items.summary:
The entire lineup of 2025 Pixel 10 smartphone are now at the best prices yet for Prime Big Deal Days, as well as the Pixel 9a down at the $349 Amazon all-time low, but there are also some deep deals on the previous-gen 9 series devices. The Pixel 9a remains the latest entry-level “a” series model – it has now dropped $150, as you’ll know from our coverage yesterday. But those looking to save a buck on the previous pro-grade handsets can now do so as part of the fall Prime Day sale – Pixel 9 Pro/XL models are now up to $350 off.

items.title: Add 1TB storage to your PC or PS5 for just $65 this Prime Day with Lexar’s heatsink SSD down to 2025 low
items.summary:
As part of the ongoing Prime Big Deal Days sale, Amazon is offering Lexar’s 1TB NM790 heatsink SSD for $64.88 shipped. This is regularly a $95 drive, which is now seeing a solid $30 discount. Today’s 32% offer marks the lowest price we have tracked for it this year, and it’s now within $14 of its all-time low price. You can also get this SSD in 2TB and 4TB capacities, both of which are down to their lowest prices of the year right now at $109.88 and $219.88 shipped, respectively. Head below for more details.

The iPhone 17 series and iPhone Air is here, but so is Prime Big Deal Days and some deep discounts on iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 15 Pro Max. We have been tracking some solid opportunities to save on ton on Amazon’s Renewed Premium iPhone 16 Pro and 15 Pro Max over the last month or so, and there are plenty of deals up for grabs during this year’s fall Prime Day event – 15 Pro Max is up to $790 off the original prices and 16 Pro is up to $500 off.

This variant of the Tab M11 with an included stylus typically goes for $240, so you’re looking at a $110 discount on it right now. Today’s 45% discount at Amazon lands this spec with 128GB storage and the bundled items $10 below the price it’s currently fetching directly at Lenovo. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this tablet, and it’s worth picking up if you’re shopping for an affordable tablet for everyday use. Head below for more details.

items.summary:
As part of the ongoing Prime Big Deal Days sale, Anker’s official Amazon storefront is offering its 250W 6-port charging station for $99.99 shipped. This particular model hit the scene last year carrying a $170 price tag and has maintained that for the most part, with some occasional drops to the $110 to $120 range. Today’s deal, however, takes $70 off its usual going rate to mark the steepest price drop we’ve tracked for it to date. This is the lowest price we’ve seen this charging station fetch, and it’s now below $10 of its previous all-time low. Head below for more details, along with deals on other Anker charging stations.

You can snag the brand’s 256GB PLAY PRO Express microSD for $49.88 shipped. That’s down from its usual price of $60, so you’re looking at a 17% markdown right now. While the savings aren’t huge at the moment compared to other deals, it’s a rare chance to grab these memory cards in stock and discounted as well at up to 17% off. They’re likely to sell out quickly, so grab them while you can after getting more details below.
